009
010package imagingbook.spectral.dct;
011
012
013import org.jtransforms.dct.DoubleDCT_1D;
014import org.jtransforms.dct.FloatDCT_1D;
015
016/**
017 * <p>
018 * This is fast implementation of the DCT, based on the JTransforms package by
019 * Piotr Wendykier (<a href="https://github.com/wendykierp/JTransforms">
020 * https://github.com/wendykierp/JTransforms</a>). See Sec. 20.1 of [1] for
021 * additional details.
022 * </p>
023 * <p>
024 * Usage example (for {@code float} data):
025 * <pre>
026 * float[] data = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 3, 0};
027 * Dct1d.Float dct = new Dct1dFast.Float(data.length);
028 * dct.forward(data);
029 * dct.inverse(data);
030 * ... </pre>
031 * <p>
032 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic
033 * Approach</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
034 * </p>
035 */
036public abstract class Dct1dFast extends Dct1dImp {
037
038        final double s;                         // common scale factor
039
040        private Dct1dFast(int M) {
041                super(M);
042                this.s = Math.sqrt(2.0 / M); 
043        }
044        
045        // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
046        
047        /**
048         * One-dimensional DCT implementation using {@code float} data. 
049         */
050        public static class Float extends Dct1dFast implements Dct1d.Float {
051                
052                private final FloatDCT_1D fct;
053                
054                /**
055                 * Constructor.
056                 * @param M the data size
057                 */
058                public Float(int M) {
059                        super(M);
060                        this.fct = new FloatDCT_1D(M);
061                }
062
063                @Override
064                public void forward(float[] g) {
065                        checkSize(g);
066                        fct.forward(g, true);
067                }
068
069                @Override
070                public void inverse(float[] G) {
071                        checkSize(G);
072                        fct.inverse(G, true);
073                } 
074                
075        }
076
077        // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
078        
079        /**
080         * One-dimensional DCT implementation using {@code double} data. 
081         */
082        public static class Double extends Dct1dFast implements Dct1d.Double {
083                
084                private final DoubleDCT_1D fct;
085                
086                /**
087                 * Constructor.
088                 * @param M the data size
089                 */
090                public Double(int M) {
091                        super(M);
092                        this.fct = new DoubleDCT_1D(M);
093                }
094
095                @Override
096                public void forward(double[] g) {
097                        checkSize(g);
098                        fct.forward(g, true);
099                }
100
101                @Override
102                public void inverse(double[] G) {
103                        checkSize(G);
104                        fct.inverse(G, true);
105                }
106        }
107
108}
